title: Ringo Starr Makes Second Appearance Into Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame
teaser: On Saturday, Ringo Starr became the last of The Beatles to get inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame for his solo work. At the ceremony in Cleveland, Ringo got a little help from an old friend.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
